r.d: Implementation of SOAP protocol and services
r.n: * Don't return a SOAP fault if the server code raises an E_STRICT error. (Bug 4828). * Fix client treating all "literal" services being "encoded" (Bug 4639). * List all dependencies in the package definition (Bug 4882). * Allow to customize success and fault HTTP headers in SOAP_Server (Request 4118). * Fix parsing of date/time strings without timezone information (Bug 4523). * Fix reference notices with PHP 4.4 and PHP 5 (Bugs 4870, 6371). * Catch all errors from wrapped function calls in SOAP_Server (Bug 4922). * Fix undefined method call in SOAP_Server's service() method (Bug 4923). * Fix decoding of MIME attachments (Bug 4980). * Reset HTTP headers before each request (Bug 5003). * Catch errors from WSDL parser (Bug 5460). * Properly serialize SOAP_Value objects in arrays (aschultz at warp10 dot net, Bug 5794).
